MajorClaims.MC1: human being should behave as a guardian to animals rather than as their lord or masters

Claims.C1: Animal rights are meant to set limits on human behavior
Claims.C2: Human being has driven many animals for their personal use such as, cows and other milch animals for yielding milk from them
Claims.C3: many farmers and owners exploit animals beyond their limits
Claims.C4: thousand of animals undergo painful suffering or death as a result of scientific research of drugs and various products

Premises.P1: Likewise, other animals such as, horses, cattles and donkeys for farming, agriculture and as a mode of transportation
Premises.P2: Many people keep pets like dogs and cats, trained them as service dogs and snuffing dogs which are very helpful to police force and even to some blind peoples
Premises.P3: They are kept for security purposes in houses
Premises.P4: cows are often injected by Oxytocin, a hormone which is used to forcibly increase lactation
Premises.P5: This in turn, causes lots of discomfort and pain to the cattle
Premises.P6: Another example of this is cage farming which is against animal rights
Premises.P7: Many other practices like, equestrian sport where horses run miles and miles and beaten up by jockeys to make them run more faster
Premises.P8: And above all pleasure hunting of defenseless animals
